attributes.action: The Government should make plans to hold a 3rd Referendum / Peoples Vote
attributes.additional_details: I propose that in preparation for this amendment getting passed, and pressure be placed on the Government to hold a 2nd "People's Vote". The Government should prepare and make plans for the inevitable calls for a 3rd vote...So on and so forth.
attributes.background:
Moves are being made by the opposition to bring forward amendments to hold another "Peoples Vote" or "2nd Referendum". 
Effectively ignoring the result of the 1st Referendum and clearly forgetting that, as a whole, Parliament voted to trigger Article 50 and Leave the EU, with or without a deal.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "make plans for".

If you don't want there to be a second referendum you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241418
